author: mariusvanderwijden
content: <@!199561711278227457> I've created a new branch `merge-devnet-4` for tomorrows devnet. It contains the changes to the engine api as well as the ForkID changes. In order to enable them, you need to add a `"mergeForkBlock"` in the genesis.json which should happen before the TTD (but it doesn't really matter as it is only used to decide which peers to connect to). I don't know if any CL's have already implemented the new rules (kintsugi-spec-v3) though.
